languages.text: "Рад видеть, с какой скоростью ты постигаешь науку жизни в Комморре. Это действительно принятый здесь порядок вещей".
"Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."
languages.original_text: "Рад видеть, с какой скоростью ты постигаешь науку жизни в Комморре. Это действительно принятый здесь порядок вещей".

traits.locale_text: "Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."

languages.text: “我很高兴，你这么快就掌握了在科摩罗生活的诀窍。这样的生活方式可真不错。”
languages.original_text: "Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴，你这么快就掌握了在科摩罗生活的诀窍。这样的生活方式可真不错。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Me alegro de ver que te estás acostumbrando a la situación en Commorragh. No se vive tan mal».
languages.original_text: "Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de ver que te estás acostumbrando a la situación en Commorragh. No se vive tan mal».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「早速コモラフでの生活に慣れてきたようで安心した。悪くない暮らしだぞ」
languages.original_text: "Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."

traits.locale_text: 「早速コモラフでの生活に慣れてきたようで安心した。悪くない暮らしだぞ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Schön zu sehen, wie schnell Ihr Euch in Commorragh eingewöhnt. Es ist eine wirklich schöne Lebensweise."
languages.original_text: "Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."

traits.locale_text: "Schön zu sehen, wie schnell Ihr Euch in Commorragh eingewöhnt. Es ist eine wirklich schöne Lebensweise."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Je vois que vous prenez vite le pli des coutumes de Commorragh. Vous verrez, c'est un mode de vie très agréable. »
languages.original_text: "Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous prenez vite le pli des coutumes de Commorragh. Vous verrez, c'est un mode de vie très agréable. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Commorragh'ta işlerin nasıl yürüdüğünü kavramaya başlamışsın, güzel. Yaşayacaksan böyle yaşayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Good to see how fast you're getting the hang of things in Commorragh. It's really a nice way to live."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'ta işlerin nasıl yürüdüğünü kavramaya başlamışsın, güzel. Yaşayacaksan böyle yaşayacaksın."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
